eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Informed Consent
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Signed written Informed Consent: Subjects or their legally responsible representatives must be willing and able to give signed and dated written informed consent

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Diagnosis of T1DM
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Diagnosis of T1DM. In addition, the following criteria also needs to be met; i) Central laboratory test of C-peptide < 0.7 ng/ml (0.23 nmol/L)

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Insulin Use
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Insulin use for at least 12 months prior to screening per subject report or medical records and a) Method of insulin administration (MDI or CSII) must have been unchanged for at least 3 months prior to the screening visit per subject reported or medical records. Subjects must be taking a total insulin dose of ≥0.3 U/kg/day for at least 3 months prior to the screening visit b) If on MDI insulin administration, subject must be taking ≥3 injections per day

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: HbA1c Eligibility
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: HbA1c eligibility criteria include: a) Screening visit: Central laboratory HbA1c ≥7.7% and ≤11.0% b) Week -1 Visit: Central laboratory HbA1c ≥7.5 % and ≤10.5%

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: BMI Requirement
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Body mass index (BMI) ≥18.5 kg/m²

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Age and Reproductive Status
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Men and women, ages 18 to 75 years, inclusive. Women of childbearing potential (WOCBP) must have a negative serum or urine pregnancy test within 24 hours prior to the start of investigational product. Women must not be breastfeeding. WOCBP and sexually active males must agree to follow instructions for method(s) of contraception.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: History of T2DM
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: History of T2DM. Note: subjects with a previous misdiagnosis of T2DM in their medical history must have one of the following in order to be eligible for this trial: Positive autoantibodies for GAD65, phosphatase IA-2/IA2β, or zinc transporter 8 (ZnT8) or Fasting c-peptide value below the lower limit of detection performed by the Central Laboratory

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: MODY History
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: History of maturity-onset diabetes of the young (MODY)

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Pancreatic Disorders
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Pancreatic surgery, chronic pancreatitis, or other pancreatic disorders that could result in decreased β-cell capacity (eg, pancreatogenous diabetes)

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Previous SGLT-2 Use
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Previous use of dapagliflozin and/or any other SGLT-2 inhibitors

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Insulin-sensitizing Agents
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Use of insulin-sensitizing agents, such as metformin and/or thiazolidinediones, within 2 months prior to the screening visit

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: GLP-1 Receptor Agonist Use
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Use of any GLP-1 receptor agonist within the following timeframe prior to the screening visit: 1 month for once or twice daily administration (eg, liraglutide); 2 months for once weekly administration

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Non-insulin Antihyperglycemic Use
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Use of any non-insulin antihyperglycemic agent within 1 month prior to the screening visit

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: History of DKA
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: History of DKA requiring medical intervention (eg, emergency room visit and/or hospitalization) within 1 month prior to the screening visit

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Hospital Admission for Glycemic Control
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: History of hospital admission for glycemic control (either hyperglycemia or hypoglycemia) within 1 month prior to the Screening visit

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Severe Hypoglycemia Episodes
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Frequent episodes of severe hypoglycemia as defined by more than one episode requiring medical assistance, emergency care (paramedics or emergency room care), and/or glucagon therapy administered by a third-party individual within 1 month prior to the screening visit

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Poorly Controlled Diabetes Symptoms
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Symptoms of poorly controlled diabetes that would preclude participation in this trial including, but not limited to, marked polyuria and polydipsia with greater than 10% weight loss during the 3 months prior to the screening visit, or other signs and symptoms of poor glycemic control

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Addison's or Adrenal Insufficiency
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: History of Addison’s disease or chronic adrenal insufficiency

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Diabetes Insipidus
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: History of diabetes insipidus

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Cardiovascular Disease
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Any of the following cardiovascular (CV)/vascular disease within 6 months of the screening visit: Myocardial infarction, Cardiac surgery or revascularization, Unstable angina, Unstable congestive heart failure (CHF), NYHA CHF Class III or IV, TIA or significant cerebrovascular disease, Unstable or previously undiagnosed arrhythmia

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Renal Disease
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Renal disease: History of unstable or rapidly progressing renal disease; Conditions of congenital renal glucosuria; Renal allograft

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Hepatic Diseases
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Significant hepatic disease, including, but not limited to, chronic active hepatitis and/or severe hepatic insufficiency

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Hematological and Oncological Disease
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: History of hemoglobinopathy (except sickle cell trait or thalassemia minor); Known immunocompromised status; Donation of blood > 400 mL within 8 weeks; Malignancy within 5 years; History of bladder cancer; History of radiation therapy to the lower abdomen or pelvis

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Liver Function Tests
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Aspartate aminotransferase (AST) > 3x ULN; Alanine aminotransferase (ALT) > 3x ULN; Serum total bilirubin (TB) > 2x ULN unless exclusively caused by Gilbert’s Syndrome

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Creatinine Clearance
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Calculated creatinine clearance (CrCl) < 60 mL/min as estimated by the Cockcroft-Gault formula at the screening visit

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Hemoglobin Levels
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Hemoglobin ≤11.0 g/dL (110 g/L) for men; hemoglobin ≤10.0 g/dL (100 g/L) for women

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Hepatitis Status
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Positive for hepatitis B surface antigen or anti-hepatitis C virus antibody

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Abnormal Free T4
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Abnormal Free T4 (abnormal TSH value at enrollment will be further evaluated for free T4)

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Allergies
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Allergies or contraindication to the contents of dapagliflozin tablets or insulin

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Pregnancy/Breastfeeding
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Women who are pregnant or breastfeeding

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Incarceration
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Prisoners or subjects who are involuntarily incarcerated; Subjects who are compulsorily detained for treatment of either a psychiatric or physical illness

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Weight Loss/Exercise Programs
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Subjects on a commercial weight loss program with ongoing weight loss, or on an intensive exercise program; History of bariatric surgery or lap-band procedure within 12 months prior to screening

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Corticosteroid Therapy
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Replacement or chronic systemic corticosteroid therapy, defined as any dose of systemic corticosteroid (including local injections) taken for > 4 weeks within 3 months prior to the Day 1 visit

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Unstable Disorders
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Any unstable endocrine, psychiatric or rheumatic disorders as judged by the investigator

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Volume Depletion
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Volume-depleted subjects. Subjects at risk for volume depletion due to co-existing conditions or concomitant medications who cannot carefully monitor their volume status

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Compliance and Medical Judgment
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Subject who, in the judgment of the investigator, is found to be unlikely to comply with the protocol, or is unable to correctly administer subcutaneous insulin injections and/or manage their insulin pump, or has any severe concurrent medical or psychological condition

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Substance Abuse
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Subject is currently abusing alcohol or other drugs or has done so within the last 6 months prior to the Day 1 visit

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Investigator/Employee Conflict
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Subject is a participating investigator, study coordinator, employee of an investigator, or employee of BMS/AstraZeneca

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Other Investigational Drug
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Administration of any other investigational drug within 30 days of the screening visit
